Detailed Description

Format detection implementation that uses several other detectors.

The detectors are used on the file one after the other until one succeed.

Member Function Documentation

void CompositeFormatDetector::addDetector ( FormatDetector &  detector)

Put a detectors in the end of the detection list.

The detectors added will be used last and therefore will have the lowest priority.
